articles.title: Check your Android phone! These 5 popular apps must be deleted immediately - Express
articles.description: ANDROID users face another serious threat as hackers use a new technique that mimics popular apps in an attempt to trick users into installing them on their phones, where they can gain access to personal data, including bank details and private texts.
